Title: Dunsley Heat oxypic 0.5ltr
Description: Maximising your heating system's efficiency for years to come, Dunsley Heat Oxypic provides ongoing liquid protection against corrosion, scale and oxide sludge while expelling air from system water as it circulates. Added to new heating installations during final fill-up, this dark brown liquid, made up of a blend of alkalis, tannins, polymers and minerals, provides automatic and permanent sealing of even the most difficult to detect pinprick leaks. Oxypic will not have any adverse effects and is capable of protecting all internal system parts, meaning that there's no longer any need to worry about rust, limescale or sludge.

Title: Valor Black Beauty 300000652 pilot unit
Description: This Valor pilot unit is for use in the brand's Black Beauty fire.  A pilot assembly normally includes a pilot bracket, injector, electrode and thermocouple. The pilot flame ignites gas entering an appliance's main burner via the gas valve when the system is switched on. The pilot flame operates alongside the printed circuit board (PCB) and the rest of the pilot assembly for safe and efficient ignition.
